name: Solitaire Fairytale Game
description:
Solitaire like no other. Experience artistic beauty in 1500+ levels. Soothing, relaxing yet progressively challenging. Dive into a fairytale through beautiful thematic episodes.

We’re people who enjoy creating. We wanted to bring joy from beauty, relaxing yet taking a challenge to others - thus Solitaire Fairytale was created. Thousands of players are already enjoying the game on Facebook. Now you can play it on mobile too!

Immerse yourself in a fairytale game with thematic episodes. As a player you progress through the pages of Magical Book. Each page is a new chapter, new theme, new story. Beautiful backgrounds, gentle graphics, smooth animations, soothing music will take you into peaceful moments. While focusing your mind onto real challenges that progressively rise in difficulty you’ll experience quiet moments of tranquility intertwined with occasional emotional bursts of excitement or disappointment when a level gets on you.

We don’t pressure you into payments. We don’t ask for your personal data, for your friends. We let you play the way you want, as much as you want. We do not sell ads!

Here are the features of Solitaire Fairytale:

• 1500+ original levels spread into 100+ episodes
• new episodes regularly
• progressively rising real challenge
• no ads, no pressure to buy items
• beautiful thematic backgrounds for each episode
• calming, soothing music
• smooth, eye-pleasing animations
• collections, rewards, progressive map unlocking

Try it yourself. A fairytale world is open to you.
